property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around the composite.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for composites.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for composites.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for composites.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for composites.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for composites.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the composite. A value between 0 and 1.

property.name: animation
property.description: Animation that is triggered on emergence and disappearance of a Composite. Supported animation types are "slideIn", "slideOut", "fadeIn", "fadeOut", "flyInTop", "flyInBottom", "flyInRight", "flyInLeft", "flyOutTop", "flyOutBottom", "flyOutRight, "flyOutLeft".

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over a composite.
